database.name: VIEW EFIN_RDV_ENCUM_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS efin_rdv_encum_v_id, txn.ad_client_id, txn.ad_org_id, txn.isactive, txn.created, txn.createdby, txn.updated, txn.updatedby, rdv.efin_rdv_id, txn.efin_rdvtxn_id, txn.txn_version, rdv.efin_budget_manencum_id AS poencum, ord.grandtotal AS poamt, CASE WHEN inv.em_efin_budget_type = 'F' THEN inv.em_efin_manualencumbrance_id ELSE inv.em_efin_funds_encumbrance_id END AS fndencum, CASE WHEN inv.em_efin_budget_type = 'C' THEN inv.em_efin_manualencumbrance_id ELSE '' END AS cstencum, inv.grandtotal AS invamt, inv.documentno, inv.docstatus, enc.amount FROM efin_rdvtxn txn JOIN efin_rdv rdv ON rdv.efin_rdv_id = txn.efin_rdv_id LEFT JOIN c_order ord ON ord.c_order_id = rdv.c_order_id JOIN c_invoice inv ON txn.efin_rdvtxn_id = inv.em_efin_rdvtxn_id JOIN efin_budget_manencum enc ON enc.efin_budget_manencum_id = inv.em_efin_manualencumbrance_id
